languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает и внимательно смотрит на вас словно бы новым взглядом{/n}: "Похоже, элантах, я смогла рассмотреть далеко не все стороны твоей души. Интересно... Я принимаю твой ответ и благодарю за беседу. Это первый разговор на этом судне, что действительно привнес спокойствие и радость в мою душу".

{n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает и внимательно смотрит на вас словно бы новым взглядом{/n}: "Похоже, элантах, я смогла рассмотреть далеко не все стороны твоей души. Интересно... Я принимаю твой ответ и благодарю за беседу. Это первый разговор на этом судне, что действительно привнес спокойствие и радость в мою душу".

Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se queda quieta y te mira con atención, como si fuese la primera vez que te ve.{/n} «Parece que tu alma tiene muchas facetas en las que no había reparado, elantach. Qué interesante... Acepto tu respuesta y te agradezco que hayas hablado conmigo. De todas las conversaciones que he mantenido a bordo de esta nave, esta es la única que ha aportado serenidad y júbilo a mi alma».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se queda quieta y te mira con atención, como si fuese la primera vez que te ve.{/n} «Parece que tu alma tiene muchas facetas en las que no había reparado, elantach. Qué interesante... Acepto tu respuesta y te agradezco que hayas hablado conmigo. De todas las conversaciones que he mantenido a bordo de esta nave, esta es la única que ha aportado serenidad y júbilo a mi alma».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは、まるで初めてあなたを見たかのようにジッと見つめている。{/n}「お前の魂には、我が考えてもみなかった多くの面があるようだ、エランタ。面白い…我と話してくれたことに感謝する。この船に乗って以来、初めて魂に静けさと喜びをもたらすような会話ができたと思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは、まるで初めてあなたを見たかのようにジッと見つめている。{/n}「お前の魂には、我が考えてもみなかった多くの面があるようだ、エランタ。面白い…我と話してくれたことに感謝する。この船に乗って以来、初めて魂に静けさと喜びをもたらすような会話ができたと思う」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特一动不动地看着你，仿佛今天才第一次认识你。{/n}“外界人，看来你的灵魂还有许多地方值得我探索。很有意思……我接受这个回答，感谢你与我交谈。这是自我登上这艘飞船以来，第一次因为与他人交谈而获得灵魂的平静与快乐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特一动不动地看着你，仿佛今天才第一次认识你。{/n}“外界人，看来你的灵魂还有许多地方值得我探索。很有意思……我接受这个回答，感谢你与我交谈。这是自我登上这艘飞船以来，第一次因为与他人交谈而获得灵魂的平静与快乐。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet s'immobilise et vous scrute attentivement, comme si elle vous voyait pour la première fois.{/n} « Il semble que votre âme présente nombre de facettes que je n'avais encore jamais remarquées, elantach. Intéressant... J'accepte votre réponse et je vous remercie d'avoir pris le temps de me parler. C'est la première conversation à bord de ce vaisseau qui inspire un peu de sérénité et de paix à mon âme. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet s'immobilise et vous scrute attentivement, comme si elle vous voyait pour la première fois.{/n} « Il semble que votre âme présente nombre de facettes que je n'avais encore jamais remarquées, elantach. Intéressant... J'accepte votre réponse et je vous remercie d'avoir pris le temps de me parler. C'est la première conversation à bord de ce vaisseau qui inspire un peu de sérénité et de paix à mon âme. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet verstummt und blickt dich eindringlich an, als würde sie dich zum ersten Mal sehen.{/n} "Eure Seele hat offenbar viele Facetten, die ich noch nicht bedacht habe, Elantach. Interessant ... Ich akzeptiere Eure Antwort und danke Euch, dass Ihr mit mir gesprochen habt. Das ist das erste Gespräch auf diesem Schiff, das meiner Seele wirklich Friede und Freude gebracht hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet verstummt und blickt dich eindringlich an, als würde sie dich zum ersten Mal sehen.{/n} "Eure Seele hat offenbar viele Facetten, die ich noch nicht bedacht habe, Elantach. Interessant ... Ich akzeptiere Eure Antwort und danke Euch, dass Ihr mit mir gesprochen habt. Das ist das erste Gespräch auf diesem Schiff, das meiner Seele wirklich Friede und Freue gebracht hat."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, duraksayarak seni ilk kez görmüş gibi dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Ruhunun dikkatimden kaçan birçok yüzü varmış elantach. İlginç... Cevabını kabul ediyorum, benimle konuştuğun için teşekkür ederim. Bu gemide ruhuma huzur ve neşe katan ilk muhabbet buydu."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet goes still and looks at you intently as if seeing you for the first time.{/n} "It seems there are many facets of your soul that I have not considered, elantach. Interesting... I accept your answer and thank you for speaking with me. This is the first conversation on board this vessel that has truly brought serenity and joy to my soul."
